name: Grabtron
description:
GRABTRON is a machine specially designed for GRABBING and SMASHING. Armed with only his ULTRA GRAPPLE CANNON, will he be the last robot standing? Made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.

WASD to move.

Tap left click to fire , tap again to release grapple.

Swing your mouse around to make grappled enemies crash into each other.

Art and Music - farrisst

Scripting and Design - Docien
